FuncDef:
The set flow-control-message reliability disable command to set message congestion more than 30 minutes, the veneer will not reset.
The undo set flow-control-message reliability disable command is used to set message congestion for more than 30 minutes and the veneer will reset.
By default, if the message congestion detected by the  board is more than 30 minutes, the borad will be reset.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the message congestion detected by the board is more than 30 minutes, the borad will be reset.The set flow-control-message reliability disable command can be used to stop the board from reseting for more than 30 minutes.
